mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay(PAY_NO, PAY_METHOD, PAY_FEE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, FINAL_PRICE, SAVE_POINT, USE_POINT) VALUES ((select nvl(max(PAY_NO), 0) + 1 from pay), #{pay_method}, #{pay_fee}, #{discount_price}, #{total_price}, #{final_price}, #{save_point}, #{use_point} )
mapper.select: SELECT pay_no, pay_date FROM ( select * from pay order by pay_no desc ) WHERE rownum = 1
